greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Union_{p prime, n >= 0} {T_p(n)}, where T_m(x) = x*T_{m-1}(x) - T_{m-2}(x), m >= 2, T_0(x) = 2, T_1(x) = x (dilated Chebyshev polynomials of the first kind).
comment: From a problem in A269254. For detailed theory, see [Hone].
link: Andrew N. W. Hone, et al., On a family of sequences related to Chebyshev polynomials, arXiv:1802.01793 [math.NT], 2018.
results.author: _L. Edson Jeffery_, _Bob Selcoe_ and _Andrew Hone_, Jan 27 2018
